mdRecord.dcterms:isPartOf: Francis H. Pierpont Civil War Telegrams
mdRecord.dcterms:creator: Hamilton, Henry S.
mdRecord.dcterms:description: Gov Peirpoint [Francis H. Pierpont], Wheeling Sept 12 1861. By Telegraph from Parkersburg, 12 1861. I am here with a Co for second 2d Va Cavalry ordered by Col Bolls have no subsistence tents or equipage. No officer here to muster men in and have no military control what shall I do? Answer immediately HS Hamilton Capt 38W128Col
mdRecord.dcterms:subject: Hamilton, Henry S.
Parkersburg, (West) Virginia
Wheeling, (West) Virginia
Pierpont, Francis H.
